translations: 徘徊（hover 的 ing 形式）；盘旋

sentences.sentence: Judith was hovering in the doorway.
The mishap occurred when the single-engine aircraft was caught by a gust of wind while hovering a few feet above the ground before landing.
sentences.translation: 事故发生时，这架单引擎飞机正在离地几英尺的空中悬停准备降落，此时遇到了阵风。

sentences.sentence: I have no idea why a boomerang is attacking a plant or whether the magical hovering computer monitor is aiding in the attack or fleeing the scene.
sentences.translation: 我不知道为什么回力镖会攻击植物，也不知道神奇的悬停电脑显示器是在协助攻击还是逃离现场。
